name: Blast Torque
description:
A rage platformer all about climbing up to a BODACIOUS BABE who's super HOT AS HELL. Blast, spin and use your own friction to reach that SMOKING HOT BABE at the top!!!

(Warning: Said BODACIOUS BABE does not appear yet here, this is just a playtest version. Happy playtesting!)

Controls:

Left - rotate counterclockwise

Right - rotate clockwise

Space - When the glasses are not black, hold and release to blast. The longer the charge the stronger the blast.
